strapiPost.title: Springdale's Teslar Named One of the "Best Fintechs to Work For"
strapiPost.content:
A Springdale-based fintech company has been named to the American Banker’s list of the ‘Best Fintechs to Work For’ in 2021. This is the first time any Arkansas based company has been recognized.

  • Springdale-based Teslar Software, which provides portfolio management tools for community banks, earned the no. 21 spot on American Banker’s list. Little Rock-based Smiley Technologies was named the second-best fintech to work for in the United States.

  • What is fintech and who is Teslar? “Teslar Software provides a fulfilling professional experience combined with an enjoyable employee experience... “We have a family-style environment and every one of our team members is passionate about providing our customers with the technology they need to help the individuals and businesses in their communities thrive,” said Rachael Carter, VP of client advocacy at Teslar Software. Arkansas Money & Politics

  • Last fall, Teslar partnered with 50 small regional banks to help process PPP loans and manage the debt forgiveness process. Ultimately, assisting with putting money back into the community and keeping the lights on for small businesses.
